Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Minor border flare-ups are still occurring, including a recent attack on the [[DM.Factions[faction_Steiner],Lyran]] world [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Zaniah],Zaniah]] by [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMarikFWLM],Free Worlds League forces]].  The enigmatic [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMercSnordsIrregulars],Snord's Irregulars]] were sent to relieve the beleaguered Lyran forces on Zaniah driving off the invading forces.  Civilian casualties over the course of the raid were high as the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]] forces primary raid targets were all in major population centers.  ComStar extends their prayers to those impacted by the senseless violence.



[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCorpSLLewisInc],S.L. Lewis Inc.]] has begun shipping their first production run of [[DM.VehicleDefs[vehicledef_SAVANNAHMASTER].Description,Savannah Master]] hover scout vehicles, with the Lyran Commonwealth being the primary investor.   These small craft barely qualify as a combat vehicle with very little armor and only a single Medium Laser, though they do move at an impressive speed.



Pirate raids continue while the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGreatHouses],Great Houses]] are preoccupied with their own goals.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
ComStar has begun an initiative to help repair water treatment facilities on several [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]] worlds to provide clean and pure water for those populations.  If you are interested in aiding your fellow man, we encourage you to reach out to your local [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreComStarAdept],Adept]].



If anyone has further information on the actions of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMercSnordsIrregulars],Snord's Irregulars]] on Zaniah, we would be interested in those details.





This has been the CNB February broadcast.
